column4: BUDGET PROVISIONS FOR SCHEMES FOR THE WELFARE OF CHILDREN

column1: Recognizing that children under 18 years of age constitute a significant percentage of the Indian population, the Government is committed to their welfare and development.  This statement reflects provisions for expenditure on schemes that are meant substantially for the welfare of children.  These provisions indicate education outlays, provisions for the girl child, health, provisions for child protection etc.
